statements: UPDATE astronauts_health SET age = 35, weight_kg = 70.5 WHERE astronaut_id = 1;
UPDATE astronauts_health SET heart_rate = 75, medical_history = 'No major issues' WHERE astronaut_id = 3;
UPDATE astronauts_health SET heart_rate=80, age=35 WHERE astronaut_id=1;
UPDATE astronauts_health SET weight_kg=75.50, blood_type='AB+', medical_history='No major issues' WHERE astronaut_id=3;
UPDATE health_records SET heart_rate = 80, blood_pressure = '120/80' WHERE astronaut_id = 1;
UPDATE medical_records SET medical_history = 'No major medical history', allergies = 'None' WHERE astronaut_id = 1;
UPDATE health_records SET blood_pressure='120/80', weight=75 WHERE astronaut_id=1;
UPDATE medical_records SET medical_history='Appendectomy in 2015', allergies=null WHERE astronaut_id=2;
UPDATE astronaut SET age = 35, weight = 70.5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE health_record SET heart_rate = 75 WHERE astronaut_id = 1;
UPDATE astronaut SET age = 35, weight = 70.5 WHERE id = 1
UPDATE health_record SET temperature = 98.6, heart_rate = 80 WHERE astronaut_id = 1
UPDATE astronauts SET age = 35, health_status = 'Excellent' WHERE astronaut_id = 1;
UPDATE space_travel SET duration = 10, destination = 'Mars' WHERE travel_id = 3;
UPDATE astronauts SET age = 40, health_status = 'Fit' WHERE astronaut_id = 5
UPDATE vital_signs SET heart_rate = 75, blood_pressure = '120/80' WHERE astronaut_id = 3
UPDATE Astronauts SET age = 40 WHERE astronaut_id = 1;
UPDATE HealthRecords SET blood_pressure = '120/80', heart_rate = 70 WHERE astronaut_id = 1;
UPDATE Astronauts SET age = 35, gender = 'Female' WHERE astronaut_id = 1;
UPDATE HealthRecords SET blood_pressure = '120/80', heart_rate = 70 WHERE astronaut_id = (SELECT astronaut_id FROM Astronauts WHERE name = 'John Doe');
